SCRIPT.MSCRI:
@echo off !----------------------------------------------- Parameter validation --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSHIFT.PUB.INCLUDE.LOG_CONNECTION_PARAMS
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Resource Type " :SET &ATTRIBUTE_VARA# = "PCK.AUTOMIC.PUB.VARA.RESOURCE_TYPE" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_RESOURCE_TYPE# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_ATTRIBUTE# = &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_RESOURCE_TYPE#
! Get attribute value key :INC PCK.AUTOMIC.OPENSHIFT.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_KEY
: SET &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_RESOURCE_TYPE# = &ATTRIBUTE#
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Resource Name " : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_RESOURCE_NAME# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Key-Value pair " : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_KEY_VALUE_PAIR# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Project Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_PROJECT# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!----------------------------------------- Replace Resource Command ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSHIFT.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD@WIN
:IF &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_PROJECT# NE "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSHIFT.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_PROJECT@WIN : PRINT "Project scope has been changed. You are currently working in project &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_PROJECT#" :ENDIF
: SET &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_CMD#," set env ") : SET &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_CMD#,&UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_RESOURCE_TYPE# ) : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# =&UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_RESOURCE_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSHIFT.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_CMD#,"/&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#" )
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# =&UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_KEY_VALUE_PAIR# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSHIFT.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_CMD#," &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# " )
: PRINT "Set Environment Variable: &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_CMD#"
&UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_CMD#
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** SET ENVIRONMENT VARIABLE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** SET ENVIRONMENT VARIABLE ACTION EXECUTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSHIFT.PUB.INCLUDE.LOG_OUT@WIN
